3.10.0.0.message: **CORS**: Added an option to skip returning the Access-Control-Allow-Origin response header when requests don't have the Origin header.

3.8.0.0.message: **CORS**: Fixed an issue where the `Access-Control-Allow-Origin` header was not sent when `conf.origins` has multiple entries but includes `*`.

3.5.0.message: **CORS**: Support the `Access-Control-Request-Private-Network` header in crossing-origin pre-light requests

3.4.3.5.message: **CORS**: Support the `Access-Control-Request-Private-Network` header in crossing-origin pre-light requests

3.2.1.0.message:
**Improved Plugin Documentation**: Revised docs for the following plugins to include examples: 
- [CORS](/plugins/cors/)
- [File Log](/plugins/file-log/)
- [HTTP Log](/plugins/http-log/)
- [JWT Signer](/plugins/jwt-signer/)
- [Key Auth](/plugins/key-auth/)
- [OpenID Connect](/plugins/openid-connect/)
- [Rate Limiting Advanced](/plugins/rate-limiting-advanced/)
- [SAML](/plugins/saml/)
- [StatsD](/plugins/statsd/)

2.8.0.0.message:
**CORS**: The CORS plugin does not send the `Vary: Origin` header anymore when the header `Access-Control-Allow-Origin` is set to `*`.

Thanks, [@jkla-dr](https://github.com/jkla-dr)! [#8401](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/8401)
